== Installation ==
Follow the steps to unlock bootloader, install custom recovery, and root.  Reboot into Recovery and flash the phablet zip followed by the latest daily snapshot of ubuntu rootfs http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-touch-preview/daily-preinstalled/current/saucy-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip and reboot.

=== Unlocking instructions ===
Bootloader Unlock: http://vulnfactory.org/blog/2013/04/08/motorola-bootloader-unlocking/
Root: http://www.droidrzr.com/index.php/topic/15208-root-motochopper-yet-another-android-root-exploit-412/
Fastboot flash CWM Recovery or TWRP

=== link to images ===
http://goo.im/devs/Hashcode/xt926/phablet

== Known issues ==
Front facing camera appears upside down. Video playback of recorded movies sometimes appears upside down.
